Name: Natnael Yirga
Banner.Description: I have 1+ years of experience developing systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in ASP.NET Core and Angular applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 1+ years as a developer, I seek to train every day. I have worked writing unit tests, performing continuous integration, and covering backend developer roles with ASP.NET Core and Mysql. I have led teams having empathy, exercising motivation to partners, and setting plans and goals together.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience
FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Smart Vital Event Registration Management Systems
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Oromia Civil Registration System is a web application that is mainly used to register civilians for Oromia regional State government to track and manage region’s civilians' events like birth, death, adoption, marriage and divorce.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Geez Net
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Converts ASCII number like '3456' to Geez number '፴፬፻፶፮' and vise versa.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Lucy Calendar
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Converts Gregorian date to Ethiopian date and vise versa.

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Pokemon
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Pokemon search engine that uses the pokeapi. Object-oriented programming was used to organize the information of the pokemons along with their respective image.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Coming soon page
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a two-column split page to be used as a 'Coming soon page'. Scheduled to be a fully responsive design. It has a form field to subscribe by email.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Four card feature section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page that has a minimal design, listing four features on four cards. Input animations are done with angular animations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Social proof section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a page designed from a Figma layout. Angular was used for development together with SASS and CSS GRID.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: FAQ accordion card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: FAQ accordion with logic and animations made in Angular.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Profile card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message.
